note: Totals by geographical region are WIPO estimates. Each region includes the following number of offices: Africa (34), Asia (46), Europe (44), Latin America and the Caribbean (31), Northern America (2) and Oceania (7).
title: Life science patents granted, by filing office
subtitle: [Patents](#dod:patents) granted within the fields of medical technology, biotechnology, and pharmaceuticals by filing office. These patents cover a wide range of innovations, including new drugs, medical devices, diagnostic methods, genetic engineering techniques, and biotechnological processes.

display.entityAnnotationsMap: Patent Office of the Cooperation Council for the Arab States of the Gulf: Stopped accepting applications in 2021
